problem.name: FizzBuzz STRICT
description: Write a function to solve the classic FizzBuzz example problem.
* FizzBuzz, if N is divisible by both 3 and 5
* Fizz, if N is divisible by 5, but not 3
* Buzz, if N is divisible by 3, but not 5
* an empty string, if N is divisible by neither 3 nor 5
problem.html:
Problem name: FizzBuzz STRICT

Description:

Write a function to solve the classic FizzBuzz example problem.,Given an integer N, return:,* FizzBuzz, if N is divisible by both 3 and 5,* Fizz, if N is divisible by 5, but not 3,* Buzz, if N is divisible by 3, but not 5,* an empty string, if N is divisible by neither 3 nor 5

Function signature: fizzbuzz(n)

Test Cases:

  • 7 -> ""
  • 10 -> "Fizz"
  • 12 -> "Buzz"
  • 15 -> "FizzBuzz"
  • 45 -> "FizzBuzz"
  • 93 -> "Buzz"
  • 95 -> "Fizz"
  • 97 -> ""
  • 120 -> "FizzBuzz"
  • 125 -> "Fizz"
  • 126 -> "Buzz"
